description: Big enough for your grandest adventures and light enough to keep up the pace, the Ozone 4-Wheel 85L is the first-class luggage experience you've been waiting for. They've re-engineered the Ozone, from frame to fabrics, to deliver the most premium travel experience possible. A high-clearance chassis clears obstacles with ease while a reinforced, ultralight aluminum frame provides revolutionary structure and protection.
name: Ozone 4-Wheel 85L / 30"
